author: "Alex Matrunich"
date: "November 5, 2016"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
es14 <- loadesdata()
load(file.path(Sys.getenv("HOME"), "esdata13.RData"))
rm("esdatafcl13"); gc()

es14 <- es14 %>% esdata2faoarea(geonom)
```

```{r}
es14newhs <- es14 %>% 
  anti_join(esdata13, 
            by = c("hs", "flow", "reporter")) %>% 
  distinct()

es14newhs %>% 
  group_by(reporter) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))

write.csv(es14newhs %>% 
            select(reporter, flow, hs) %>% 
            arrange(reporter, flow, hs), 
          file = file.path(Sys.getenv("HOME"), 
                           "eurostat14newhs.csv"),
          row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE)
```
